title: Software Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Retail Apparel and Fashion
description:
**Job description** 




 Our team owns, develops, and advocates our IDP (internal developer portal): Backstage. This means you'll be part of:
 


* Onboarding services, designing and developing features, custom plugins and integrations with 3rd party systems
* Maintaining installation stable, secure, efficient, and up-to-date
* Collaborating with stakeholders, including developers, architects, and infrastructure teams, to understand requirements, gather feedback, continuously improve Backstage, and support them in their onboarding and plugin development
* Making code quality improvements



  





**Required skills** 



* Experience with the development of modern, cloud-based, containerized solutions
* Strong JavaScript skills coupled with experience in React and Node.js
* Experienced with relational databases, RESTful APIs, GitHub
* Senior behaviour, demonstrating leadership and empowerment towards peers, and strategic thinking about technology
* Comfortable in facilitating and participating in the team discussions and problem solving



  





**Good to have** 



* Experience with: Docker, Kubernetes, monitoring tools like Grafana or Splunk
* Proficiency in making code quality improvements and ensuring high standards in all development processes
* Collaborating with stakeholders, including developers, architects, and infrastructure teams, to understand requirements, gather feedback, and continuously improve the platform
* Familiarity with Azure DevOps, YAML, Kubernetes, GraphQL, Terraform, automated code analysis tools
* Capability to support onboarding services and plugin development

title: Java Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Angular-JS
* English Language
* GIT
* Java 6-8
* JavaScript
* Jenkins
* OpenShift
* Spring


**Application deadline:** 
 17-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Developer
description:
**About the job** 




 Are you ready to step into a world full of innovation and opportunities? Looking for the next step in your career? Look no further!
 



  





 We are now seeking new colleagues for Rocket. At Rocket, the belief is that companies exist for people – not the other way around. We are looking for you, a
 **Senior Developer** 
 , to join their dynamic team and their journey forward!
 



  





 Whether they’re diving into complex new technologies or heading out on their next surfing or skiing adventure, your team at Rocket champions transforming complexity into simplicity and enjoyment. You’ll be working with amazing people and exciting technology, having fun, being innovative, and creating outstanding products and services in areas like automation, full-stack development, cloud services & DevOps, and security.
 



  





 In your role as a
 **Senior Developer** 
 , you’ll work on exciting projects for their clients while also having the chance to hone your skills on fun internal projects – which Rocket will happily tell you more about! 
 



  





**Who are you?** 




 We’re looking for a true tech enthusiast at heart – a self-proclaimed nerd with a lifelong passion for technology. You didn’t pursue education just for its sake but because technology is part of your DNA. Your innate talent for tech stands out – you have a knack for diving deep into new technologies and quickly getting up to speed.
 



  





 You’re an experienced front- or backend developer with at least five years under your belt and are ready to take the next step in your career. You’re proficient in at least one high-level programming techniques, such as Python, Java, C/C++/C#, .NET, JavaScript, Ruby, React, Angular, Node, Vue, or Bootstrap, and you have solid experience designing and developing REST APIs. Additionally, you’re well-versed in cloud technologies like App Services and Functions. 
 



  





 Working with modern CI/CD pipelines such as CircleCI, GitHub Actions, and Jenkins is second nature to you. You’re fluent in both Swedish and English. The job is located in the greater Stockholm metropolitan area and therefore not looking for people for a remote employees.
 



  





 Your skills in software architecture, design, implementation, and deployment will be invaluable to the team and future projects.
 



 To top it off, we see it as a bonus if you have:
 


* Experience as a consultant
* Design skills (HTML5, CSS, SCSS, SVG, dynamic layouts, etc.)
* Knowledge in RPA & Automation
* Experience in Machine Learning
* Database expertise



  





**What can Rocket offer you?** 



* **Partnership** 
 🤝 – Influence the company’s future, participate in internal development projects, and even have the opportunity for future ownership.
* **Innovation** 
 💡 – Rocket loves innovation and working on internal development projects.
* **Occupational Health Services** 
 🌡️ – Comprehensive health care coverage.
* **Exciting Conferences** 
 🌍 – Fantastic adventure conferences and getaways with colleagues.
* **Flexibility** 
 🏡 – Rocket is highly flexible. A typical week includes a few days at the client site, one or two days in the office, and one day working from home.
* **Social Gatherings** 
 🥳 – Social events and games to connect with colleagues.
* **Central Office** 
 🏢 – A startup-style office located centrally for your convenience, close to public transport, just a minute from Östermalmstorg station.



  





  





**Performance, Kindness & Trust - Rocket**

title: Software Engineer - Frontend
description:
**Why Tendium?** 




  





 Tendium is a tech company working in the space between technology and customers. Through advanced machine-learning technologies, we are revolutionising industries with modern, efficient methods, creating new possibilities to democratise both the public and private sector markets. The team at Tendium is expanding, with everyone from data scientists to salespeople working side by side, and now we want you to join us.
 



  





 We are an ever-growing company comprised of some of the sharpest minds in Sweden. With such talent, we at Tendium naturally believe in a flat hierarchy where everyone has responsibility, autonomy, and the opportunity to provide input. Since we are increasing in size significantly, new opportunities are constantly emerging. We require ambitious, conscientious, and value-driven new colleagues to help grow the business. If you are successful in becoming a part of our team, we promise to provide a dynamic and intellectually stimulating workplace. We believe that personal and professional development is crucial, and as such, you will have the opportunity to take on real responsibility from day one.
 



  





**The Job** 




 As a frontend-focused software engineer, you'll work in an agile, self-sufficient team with full ownership of the products and features you develop. The work is organised into project cycles, balancing larger projects with smaller tasks. Many projects require cross-team collaboration, creating a dynamic and cooperative work environment. Each team possesses a wide range of skills, including backend, frontend, infrastructure, and dev-ops.
 



  





 As a member of the Super1 Team, you will work together with the other developers in your team, closely with the product side as well as developers in the rest of the tech organisation. The team's area of responsibility within the organisation is developing and maintaining our customer-facing web platform. As a frontend developer in the team you will be working with developing new user-facing features, building reusable components and libraries, and collaborating closely with our backend developers and designers to ensure a good UX/UI experience. We encourage a high level of knowledge sharing, where you learn from and coach others in the team's development and strive for maintaining and implementing a high level of code quality and best practices.
 



  





 We strive to use state-of-the-art technology and stay at the forefront of development. Agile practices ensure we build minimum viable products with high-quality code. We encourage all team members to contribute ideas, regardless of their expertise.
 



 We prefer candidates based in Stockholm and value in-person collaboration. While we operate in a hybrid environment, we thrive on working together in the office, fostering a friendly and informal atmosphere.
 



  





*This is a permanent full-time position (swe: tillsvidareanställning) with a 6-month probation period.* 




  





**Requirements:** 



* Relevant MSc degree in Computer Science, Media Technology, or a related field.
* Minimum of 3 years of professional experience in frontend development with React.
* Experience with frontend architecture.
* Residence in Stockholm or surrounding areas.
* High proficiency in English.
* Eligible to work in Sweden.



  





**Meritorious:** 



* Experience with GraphQL.



  





**Our current stack:** 



* Frontend: React/TypeScript
* Backend: GraphQL/TypeScript



  





**Who We Are Looking For** 




 For this position, we seek an individual who can demonstrate responsibility and initiative. You should value structure and possess a good ability to write readable and high-quality code. At Tendium, our tech teams prioritise continuous delivery, aiming for quality code without over-engineering. We appreciate constructive problem-solving and a willingness to take on new tasks and technologies. We value continuous learning and improvement, whether through deep expertise in one area or broad skill development.
 



  





 Effective teamwork is essential and we are looking for those qualities in you. Ideal candidates should have at least three years of frontend development experience, preferably gained in professional settings.
 



  





**Application** 




 We look forward to your application. We recruit on an ongoing basis, so apply as soon as possible. Successful candidates will initially be invited to a video interview where you will have the opportunity to meet the team.
 



  





 To make this process even more efficient, feel free to sign in to your Connect profile and add your references at any stage.
 



  





 Please find additional information on our recruitment process
 *here.* 
 If you want to know more about our culture and what you can expect when working at Tendium you can read more about it
 *here.* 




  





**Equality and inclusion statement** 




 At Tendium we celebrate diversity and are committed to fostering an inclusive workplace. We welcome applications from individuals of all backgrounds, recognising that a diverse team enhances creativity and innovation. Join us in creating an environment where everyone can thrive and contribute their unique perspectives.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Welcome to SSC – Swedish Space Corporation, the perfect workplace for those passionate about technology in general and space in particular.
   

  

 With space organizations, research institutes, institutional and commercial actors as customers, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications, space consulting
   

  

 services, rocket and balloon systems, flight test services, satellite propulsion systems, and much more.
   

  

 At SSC, we provide our customers access to Space. With over 700 employees around the world, we provide expert-level competence in customer support including the design,
   

  

 test, launch, in-orbit and routine operations of flight and space systems. To achieve this, SSC uses our global network of ground systems and multi-mission antennas to provide
   

  

 satellite management, data downlink, antenna hosting and launch support to some of the largest names in the space industry including NASA, ESA, JAXA and many other New
   

  

 Space customers as well.
   

  

**Are you fueled by a passion for people and the ambition to create an awesome workplace?
   

  

 Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey with us to help Earth benefit from space?** 
  

  

 If you answer yes to these questions, we invite you to seize the opportunity to make a significant impact as a Software Engineer in our team. We are looking for a dedicated team memberwho shares our core values of Customer passion, Care, Collaboration, Curiosity, and Courage.
   

  

**YOUR ROLE**
 We offer the opportunity to join the Software unit within SSC Connect, which is entrusted to develop and maintain critical systems required to connect our customers with their satellites.
   

  

 This is a rare and exciting opportunity to join a team that is building a new Monitoring & Control system. With a new system comes challenges beyond the code. Together with your colleagues, you will set the standard for how we build new systems, but also for how we handle a production environment in the cloud, how we enable efficient operations by enhanced observability and most importantly how we create a great user experience for our customers. What this team builds up, many other teams will use.
   

  

 It is important for us to have a good balance of experience in all teams, so currently we are looking for both a senior software engineer and a software engineer that is earlier in their development.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We think that you care – about your systems, your colleagues and your users. That you have a creative and analytical mindset. You take responsibility, drive your own initiatives and can learn and process technical details quickly. We also think that you appreciate both working autonomously and together with other people.
   

  

 You have a European citizenship and can travel within and outside Sweden if needed. As this position is critical to the operations of the SSC Services, it may include outside of standard working hours working and/or being part of an on-call team with up to 1 week on-call per month.
   

  

**What You Need To Know**
* B.S. Computer Science or Computer/Software Engineering, or similar experience
* 2+ years of software development experience (considerably longer if you aspire on the senior software engineer position)
* Experience with Golang and Python or similar languages
* Comfortable working in Linux
* Fluency in English


**EXTRA MERITS**
* Familiar with AWS
* Experience with message bus technologies like NATS/Kafka
* Experience of API development using RESTFul(JSON/XML)
* Experience of DevOps and CI/CD Methodologies
* Experience from the space industry


**WE OFFER YOU**
* An opportunity to be part of the exciting space industry and help Earth benefit from Space.
* An excellent opportunity for personal development and challenging endeavors.
* To be part of international development projects with highly engaged teams.
* A workplace characterized by an open atmosphere and proud employees all over the world.
* Possibility to work remotely part of the time (max 50%), and flexible work hours.


**LOCATION**
 This is permanent position with 40 hours/week, located at our office in Solna or Kiruna.
   

  

**NEXT STEP**
 If this opportunity sparks your interest, don’t wait—apply today! Applications are reviewed on an ongoing basis, and interviews will be conducted continuously. We kindly ask you to submit your CV when applying. While you are welcome to include a brief personal note or letter, our evaluation will primarily focus on your skills and qualifications as outlined in your CV, ensuring a fair and unbiased recruitment process.
   

  

 Please note that the job advertisement may close earlier than the stated deadline if we receive a high volume of applications. This allows us to ensure a fair and efficient recruitment process and give each application the attention it deserves.
   

  

 This is a security-classified position and will require a background check prior to employment.
   

  

**WE HELP EARTH BENEFIT FROM SPACE**
 Swedish Space Corporation (SSC) is a leading global provider of advanced space services, with more than 50 years of experience. We help space organizations, research institutes, commercial and institutional actors from all over the world to get access to space.
   

  

 With local presence on all continents and about 700 committed employees, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications and satellite control services, spacecraft operations, rocket and balloon systems, launch services and flight test services, as well as engineering, operations and consultancy services for space missions.
   

  

 We help Earth benefit from Space.

title: Business Intelligence Developer
description:
**BI-utvecklare till Agero – Skapa smarta datalösningar med oss! 🚀** 




  





 Är du en person som ser skönhet i en riktigt välskriven SQL-query? Tycker du att en dashboard kan vara både användbar och lite av en konstform? Då är det dig vi söker!
 



  





**Hos oss får du:** 



* Bygga allt från stabila datalager till flexibla dashboards som kunderna faktiskt 
 *vill* 
  använda.
* Automatisera det tråkiga så att både du och kunden kan fokusera på det roliga.
* Jobba i ett team som gillar att nörda ner sig i BI men som också är grymma på att diskutera andra ämnen vid fikat.
* Friheten att växla mellan kontoret, hemmakontoret och favoritfåtöljen framför brasan, vi gillar omväxling!



  





**Vi letar efter dig som:** 



* Har minst fem års erfarenhet av Microsofts BI-verktyg (SSAS, SSIS, SSRS, Power BI) och SQL.
* Kan strukturera datalager och bygga tabulära kuber som en mästare.
* Har en nyfikenhet som matchar våra kunders skiftande behov och ett öga för att skapa lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad.
* Är flytande i svenska – både när du kodar och när du snackar.



  





**Varför Agero?** 




 Vi satsar stort på din utveckling, från ny teknik till AI och avancerad datahantering. Som medarbetarägt företag får du dessutom påverka både din och Ageros framtid. Och eftersom vi tror på balans mellan jobb och fritid ser vi till att du trivs både framför skärmen och utanför den.
 



  





**Redo att göra BI-magi?** 




 Hör av dig så bokar vi in en kaffe (eller en digital fika!) och pratar om hur vi kan skapa smarta lösningar tillsammans. 👩‍💻☕👨‍💻

title: Back End Developer
description:
**Senior Backend Developer – Help Fix One of the Biggest Problems in Construction** 




*(No consultants/recruiters please)* 




 Before reading this ad, you probably hadn’t heard of AI-BOB. That’s okay. What matters is that we’re fixing a €10 billion problem that no one else is solving properly. And we need you to help us do it.
 



  





 So, what’s the problem? In Sweden alone,
 **one in four euros spent in construction is wasted** 
 - because of design errors, compliance failures, and poor planning. That’s enough money to build 50,000 apartments every year or three Öresund Bridges.
 **It’s 3,500 SEK wasted every second, 24/7** 
 and that’s just one country. Now, imagine the scale of this problem worldwide.
 



  





 We’re here to change that. AI-BOB is an AI-powered platform that catches construction mistakes before they happen, making sure buildings are designed right from the beginning. No costly fixes. No wasted materials. No unnecessary delays.
 



  





 If you had joined us earlier, we’d likely have already saved tons of construction waste and cut millions in unnecessary costs. So yes - you’re needed.
 



**What You’ll Be Doing** 



* **Develop scalable and efficient backend systems** 
 that power AI-BOB’s compliance platform.
* **Solve complex problems** 
 in areas like 3D algorithms, machine learning, image recognition, and generative AI.
* **Build rock-solid APIs** 
 that keep data flowing seamlessly between frontend and external systems.
* **Optimize our platform** 
 for performance, security, and scalability.
* **Collaborate with AI researchers, architects, and engineers** 
 to build innovative solutions.
* **Experiment, iterate, and push boundaries** 
 - because we’re building something that hasn’t been done before.



  





**Who We’re Looking For** 




 We’re looking for someone who
 **likes hard problems** 
 and is driven by
 **real impact** 
 .
 



 ✔
 **Expertise in TypeScript** 
 and a track record of building scalable backend systems.
 



 ✔ A
 **problem-solver at heart** 
 , with experience tackling challenges like 3D algorithms, AI/ML, image recognition, or generative AI.
 



 ✔ Someone who
 **cares about sustainability** 
 and wants to
 **cut waste from construction** 
 .
 



 ✔ A curious, creative thinker who’s fascinated by the
 **intersection of construction and tech** 
 .
 



 ✔ A self-starter who thrives in a
 **fast-moving, product-focused environment** 
 .
 



  





**Why AI-BOB?** 




 🚀
 **Be Part of Something Big** 
 – We’re fixing one of the biggest inefficiencies in construction.
 



 🌍
 **Real-World Impact** 
 – Your work will help reduce waste, cut costs, and make buildings more sustainable.
 



 💡
 **Work with Cutting-Edge Tech** 
 – AI, 3D algorithms, machine learning, automation—you name it.
 



 🤝
 **A Team That Has Your Back** 
 – We trust each other, we support each other, and we have fun doing it.
 



 💰
 **Competitive Salary & Equity** 
 – We’re still small, but we plan to grow fast—and you’ll grow with us.
 



  





**How to Apply** 




 We don’t expect you to meet 100% of the criteria. If this sounds exciting, we want to hear from you.
 



 📩
 **Send us your CV and a few words about yourself to jobs@aibob.io.** 




 We promise to get back to you as soon as we can. Let’s build something amazing together. 🚀
 



  





**More about us** 



* Part of Norrsken Foundations Impact Accelerator. Watch our pitch below:
* https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UN1MghXngus
* https://www.di.se/digital/sa-ska-hennes-ai-minska-byggfel-och-spara-miljoner/
* https://www.breakit.se/artikel/41643/elin-martensson-drar-hem-storaffar-till-ai-bob-bara-10-manader-efter-starten-visar-att-vi-ar-pa-ratt-vag
* https://www.impactloop.se/artikel/ska-gora-byggen-mer-hallbara-ai-bob-varvar-teknisk-chef-fran-fishbrain

title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer (Java) - ZEOS
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, Retail, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Over the last years, we learned that solving fulfillment-related challenges for the good of our customers helps us to fuel the growth of our platform. With more partners in Partner Program and Connected Retail joining our platform, we have been developing and testing additional further fulfilment services tailored to their needs.
   

  

 As a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer at ZEOS, Zalando’s B2B Logistics unit developing Europe’s leading Logistics Platform recently launched under the ZEOS Logistics brand, you will be part of a team working on designing technical solutions to connect various e-commerce platforms seamlessly with the robust logistics ecosystem of ZEOS.
   

  

 You will ensure that all our operational processes like warehousing, inventory management, inventory distribution, deliveries and returns can be steered on various e-commerce platforms. You will have the chance to learn about the broad business background we’re working with. In line with the overall Zalando philosophy you bring visibility and transparency to processes and thus have a huge impact on our customers and key stakeholders.
   

  

**WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)**
* You work regularly with others to ensure the right software/engineering design approaches and methodologies are applied.
* Design, develop, deploy, operate and improve software solutions that have a direct impact on our daily business with our partners.
* Discuss and design APIs and integrated solutions.
* Based on our microservices architecture, you and your team will own your code, and decide on the technologies and tools to deliver as well as operate large-scale applications on AWS.
* Working like a startup in an agile environment & taking ownership for the whole development cycle - from architecture design to testing to implementation & maintenance. Write applications from scratch with the latest technologies free of your choice.
* Shape and champion an inclusive culture and diverse team environment.


**WE'D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF**
* 10+ years of software engineering experience
* You have a deep understanding of microservice architecture, REST services and API design. Good knowledge of security concepts. Highly versed in deploying and operating applications in a cloud infrastructure.
* You are highly skilled as a Java Developer. Proven experience in frameworks like Spring Boot. Ideally you have experience with a distributed event store such as Apache Kafka.
* You have some experience with Frontend technologies like JavaScript (ES6 / ES2015), React, Typescript, Webpack, CSS/HTML, showing interest in full stack development.
* You have a good understanding of PostgreSQL and cloud architectures/platforms (preferably AWS). Check our Tech Radar for more information on the technologies we use at Zalando.
* Demonstrated strong sense of ownership, entrepreneurial & analytical thinking add to your excellent communication skills.
* Ideally, you have experience integrating third-party services, such as through developing or working with middleware solutions.
* Shopify or other e-commerce experience is a merit.


**OUR OFFER**
 Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
   

  

  

* 40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
* Hybrid working model with 60% remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
* Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
* 30 days of vacation a year
* Health and wellbeing options
* Learn all about Zalando and our values here https //jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh\_src=22377bdd1us


*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Senior Lead Back End Developer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Arkitektur, utveckling och underhåll av back enden
* Bygga EPI:er för att stödja externa integrationer samt FE
* Säkerställning av prestande och skalbarhet, databasfrågor, processer etc.
* Tätt samarbete med front end-utvecklarna för att skapa sömlösa användarupplevelser
* Övervakning, felsökning och förbättring av tillförlitligheten med hjälp av moderna verktyg.
* Leda tekniska beslut och best practices
* Hålla teamet uppdaterat i trender för AI-automation, back end-teknologier, systemarkitektur m.m.


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Senior utvecklare med fokus på Node.js, TypeScript och Fastify.
* Flytande svenska
* Erfarenhet av React och Next.js.
* Bevandrad inom PostreSQL-databaser
* Erfarenhet av att integrera AI-automation i produkter
* Bekväm i att leda och ta ägande över back end-utvecklingen
* DevOps-erfarenhet och CI/CD-pipelines
* Docker


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 21-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Software Developer - Data Connectors
description:
**Why This Role Matters**
 The Connectors team is at the heart of Funnel's success—without them, Funnel wouldn’t be able to deliver the value our customers rely on!
   

  

 Connectors are responsible for pulling data from various marketing platforms into Funnel, making it accessible for analysis and enhancement. They work closely with our customers to understand their needs and continuously improve our product. The team also collaborates with teams across design, product, and technical support, where they play a key role in addressing technical product inquiries and ensuring everything runs smoothly.
   

  

**About The Engineering Team & Your Role**
 Our teams have clear ownership of their product areas, making daily decisions in close collaboration both within and across teams, as well as with stakeholders. We work in small, iterative cycles, experimenting, learning, and updating the product multiple times a day.
   

  

 The Connectors team focuses on seamlessly fetching marketing data from diverse sources like Facebook, Google, and TikTok. We unify this data to ensure it’s readily accessible and actionable for marketers through the Funnel Data-Hub dashboard. With over 280 connectors, the team ensures each one functions reliably out of the box for our customers.
   

  

 At Funnel, our engineers handle everything from designing system architecture to implementation, deploying and monitoring our services. We put our customers first and always strive to design products that address their needs and go above and beyond.
   

  

**Skills & Experience We’re Looking For**
* +5 years of working experience as a software developer.
* Comfortable with Python.
* Hands-on experience building API integrations between different platforms to ensure smooth data flow and functionality.
* Comfortable working with large datasets, optimizing pipelines, ensuring data quality, and using the right tools to handle big data efficiently.
* Familiar with test-driven development and writing clean, testable code. You’re comfortable building tests and letting them guide your development to create reliable, high-quality software.
* Experience working with agile methodologies and team-based workflows. You’re comfortable collaborating with fellow engineers, adapting to change, and keeping initiatives moving smoothly to completion.
* Experience in improving engineering practices and processes.
* An overall strong communicator and fluent English.
* Nice to have: Experience with Infrastructure as Code in AWS.


**What Makes You a Great Match For Funnel**
* You’re humble, open to feedback and hearing alternative ways of doing things.
* You’re pragmatic, preferring to make steady, incremental progress rather than wait for the perfect solution.
* You view challenges as opportunities and embrace learning.
* You follow engineering best practices and stay current with evolving technologies.
* You enjoy collaborating across teams, working with design, product, and customers to create great solutions. Collaboration is what sets Funnel apart.
* You’re happy working with support, interacting with other departments and customers when needed.
* You’re driven to improve things and not settle with the status quo (e.g., when faced with the same support issue multiple times you try to solve the underlying problem).
* You’re comfortable with creating your own tasks as well as a clear backlog and tasks to work on.


 At this time, we can only consider applicants who are already located in
 **Stockholm** 
 and:
   

  

* Hold Swedish citizenship
* Hold EU/EEA citizenship and are currently living in Stockholm
* Have a valid Swedish work permit


 Additional Information
   

  

**Benefits & Perks**
 We offer a competitive salary along with great benefits. → Take a look at our Funnel benefits here.
   

  

**Inclusiveness**
 Research shows that many candidates, especially women and individuals from underrepresented groups, may hesitate to apply for a role unless they meet every requirement. If this role excites you and your skills and experiences align, we strongly encourage you to apply. We’re interested in what you can bring, even if you don’t check every box.
   

  

**Office-first**
 At Funnel, we have an office-first approach, and we work from the office a minimum of four days a week. We have lots of flexibility for when life happens, during the summer, through the holidays however, we avoid having standing remote days.
   

  

**About**
 Funnel is the leading Marketing Intelligence platform that empowers marketers to automatically collect, model, visualize, and analyze data from over 500 marketing platforms—without the need for SQL or scripting. Now equipped with measurement, Funnel combines Marketing Mix Modelling, Multi Touch Attribution, and Incrementality Testing to triangulate the true effectiveness of marketing efforts and provide smart, data-driven suggestions.
   

  

 Trusted by more than 2,000 businesses worldwide, including globally recognized brands such as Adidas and Sony, Funnel generated over $50M in ARR in 2023 and continues to feature in the FT 1000 list of Europe’s fastest-growing companies. Since its founding in 2014, Funnel has grown into a global team of over 300 employees, with offices in Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, London, Hamburg, and Sydney.
   

  

 Funnel is a SaaS product designed to help marketing teams own their performance. Founded in 2014 in Stockholm, and still founder-led, the Funnel team has grown with our customers – serving more than 2,000 companies from our Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, Hamburg and Sydney offices. We value increased in-person collaboration, and as such, we work a minimum of four days a week from our offices.
   

  

 We have always put the customer first, expressed in a no-commission sales model and a customer-centric development approach. We are proud to help companies such as Havas Media, Adidas, Sony, and Home Depot to unlock the true impact of their data.

title: Senior Dotnet Developer
description:
Vill du skapa lösningar som gör skillnad?
 



  





 På Wisentic arbetar du med att förbättra och utveckla vårt system Arbit, som hjälper försäkringsbolag, och försäkringstagare, att hantera administrativa processer inom skadehantering, bilglas- och djurförsäkringar på effektivare sätt.
 



  





 Här spelar du avgörande roll i arbetet med att ta Arbit till nästa nivå. Som del av ett litet utvecklingsteam är du med och tar fram lösningar som gör skillnad – både för användarna och för framtiden.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som del av ett agilt team arbetar du nära kollegor för att förverkliga idéer och säkerställa att våra kunder får den bästa möjliga upplevelsen. Du får friheten att påverka både den tekniska riktningen och hur vi arbetar med kodkvalitet, testning och implementering.
 



  





 Som backendutvecklare kommer du att analysera och förbättra vår plattform samt implementera nya funktioner. Du kommer att bl.a använda C#/.NET Core, Azure, och Typescript för att med hjälp av microtjänster bygga skalbara system som stöttar både kundernas behov och plattformens utveckling.
 



  





 Då vi är ett litet bolag, utan ett dedikerat frontendteam, så betyder det att du som backendutvecklare även kommer behöva ta tag i frontendbitarna ibland.
 



  





 Du kommer att optimera arbetsflöden och stödja övergången mot en modern, molnbaserad arkitektur. Du får frihet att påverka systemets tekniska riktning och att vara med och förbättra hur vi arbetar med kodkvalitet, testning och implementering.
 



  





 Du arbetar självständigt och tar user stories från ax till limpa. Med din erfarenhet av att bryta ner features och sätta dig in i affärens behov blir du en viktig del i att förvandla idéer till fungerande lösningar.
 



  





**Om dig** 




 Du har flera års erfarenhet som utvecklare som är bekväm att arbeta med både .NET/C# och Javascript. Kanske har du även koll på Typescript och Angular (det är det vi kör med).
 



  





 Du är en person som tar initiativ och skapar lösningar som gör skillnad. Ditt intresse för affären gör att du ser hur tekniska lösningar påverkar verksamheten.
 



  





 Du har en Bachelors/Masters inom datavetenskap eller liknande.
 



  





 Du talar och skriver engelska på en professionell nivå.
 



  





**Om oss** 




 Wisentic gör det enklare och smidigare och kanske lite roligare för försäkringsbolag att hantera sina administrativa processer. Vi hjälper våra kunder att spara tid och pengar genom att automatisera och förbättra arbetsflöden, vilket gör livet lättare både för dem och deras kunder.
 



 I takt med att försäkringsbranschen digitaliseras och efterfrågar smartare lösningar, ligger vi i framkant med innovativ teknik för att effektivisera allt från fakturering till försäkringshantering.
 



 Våra SaaS-plattformar anpassas efter varje kunds behov, oavsett om det är stora försäkringsbolag eller mindre aktörer i Norden och runt om i Europa.
 



  





 Hos Wisentic får du vara med och utveckla lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad i en trygg och spännande bransch.
 



  





**Bra att veta** 




 Vi sitter på Körsbärsvägen 5 i Stockholm, nära KTH. Vi har en flexibel modell där du kan arbeta hemifrån men de flesta arbetar från kontoret 3-4 dagar i veckan.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Bannerflow is a hyper-growth company and one of Europe's most exciting SaaS companies. We build a Creative Management Platform that allows enterprise brands to create, publish, analyze, and optimize advertising in-house, at scale and across advertising channels.
   

  

 Our agile teams are highly autonomous, collaborative and we are now looking for yet another passionate engineer to join us!
   

  

**⭐** 
**Ready for a new challenge? Here is what we offer.**
* Flexible & autonomous teams, built upon trust. Together, we decide how to win. We trust, assume the best in others, and respect the individual, which we believe is the foundation of our great engineering culture. Our teams consistently score high in motivation and engagement measurements. We believe in close collaboration and communication, within and outside of the team.
* New challenges and personal growth. We live by our entrepreneurial spirit, this means taking risks, identifying opportunities and always seeking new solutions.
* A passionate and fun culture. We are passionate about our work and believe that having lots of fun is essential for both creativity and success. Welcome to a diverse and inclusive workplace, with a lot of fun and exciting activities going on including hackathons, team activities, company trips and board game nights.
* A stable and global industry-leader based in Stockholm, expanding and scaling to new markets! We’re in a great position to drive success and seize new opportunities, our international customer base is constantly growing and so is our product. With the support of our new owners, we are making moves to expand into new markets, setting a clear course for growth in 2025.
* Constantly evolving tech and modern tooling. Our creative management platform serves 500+ million impressions every day (with a record of over 1 billion). We are constantly looking to improve our product and tech. Do you have ideas on how we can scale even faster? Bring them on!


**🥁 What tech makes you heart beat?**
**Our Ever Evolving Tech Stack Currently Consists Of**
* TypeScript / Angular
* C# / .NET
* MongoDB
* Azure & Kubernetes
* …and some more stuff


**🦋 Are you + Bannerflow = true?**
 We are seeking an experienced and ambitious engineer to join our team and help us continue to deliver the best possible products to our customers. This role is a critical part of our development team and will play a key role in shaping the direction of our technology and ensuring that our products are robust, scalable and secure.
   

  

**So, what are we looking for?**
* >5 years of experience as a software engineer delivering high-quality products
* Strong sense of ownership and personal drive
* Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
* Excellent communication, collaboration and leadership skills - paring or mobbing fellow developer is just a natural way of working for you
* Passion for mentoring and coaching team members to help them reach their full potential
* Strong interest of the latest technologies, industry trends and best practices to continually improve our products and processes


 At Bannerflow, we live by our values of passion, collaboration, and challenge. As a Software Engineer you’ll help us continue to revolutionize the Ad Tech industry through cutting-edge technology and product excellence. We offer a hybrid workplace and a competitive compensation package including pension according to ITP1, health allowance, parental leave top-up, and health care insurance. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities.
   

  

 If you are ready to take your career to the next level, we want to hear from you!

title: Python and Kubernetes Software Engineer - Data, AI/ML & Analytics
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1000+ colleagues in 70+ countries and very few roles based in offices. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing. We are hiring
 **Python and Kubernetes Specialist Engineers focused on Data, AI/ML and Analytics Solutions** 
 to join our teams building open source solutions for public cloud and private infrastructure.
   

  

 As a software engineer on the team, you'll collaborate on an end-to-end data analytics and mlops solution composed of popular, open-source, machine learning tools, such as Kubeflow, MLFlow, DVC, and Feast. You may also work on workflow, ETL, data governance and visualization tools like Apache SuperSet, dbt, and Temporal, or data warehouse solutions such as Apache Trino, or ClickHouse. Your team will own a solution from the analytics and machine learning space, and integrate with the solutions from other teams to build the world's best end-to-end data platform. These solutions may be run on servers or on the cloud, on machines or on Kubernetes, on developer desktops, or as web services.
   

  

 We serve the needs of individuals and community members as much as the needs of our Global 2000 and Fortune 500 customers; we make our primary work available free of charge and our Pro subscriptions are also available to individuals for personal use at no cost. Our goal is to enable more people to enjoy the benefits of open source, regardless of their circumstances.
   

  

**Location:** 
 This initiative spans many teams that are home-based and in multiple time zones. We believe in distributed collaboration but we also try to ensure that colleagues have company during their work hourse! Successful candidates will join a team where most members and your manager are broadly in the same time zone so that you have the benefits of constant collaboration and discussion.
   

  

**What your day will look like**
* Develop your understanding of the entire Linux stack, from kernel, networking, and storage, to the application layer
* Design, build and maintain solutions that will be deployed on public and private clouds and local workstations
* Master distributed systems concepts such as observability, identity, tracing
* Work with both Kubernetes and machine-oriented open source applications
* Collaborate proactively with a distributed team of engineers, designers and product managers
* Debug issues and interact in public with upstream and Ubuntu communities
* Generate and discuss ideas, and collaborate on finding good solutions


**What we are looking for in you**
* Professional or academic software delivery using Python
* Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Undergraduate degree in a technical subject or a compelling narrative about your alternative chosen path
* Confidence to respectfully speak up, exchange feedback, and share ideas without hesitation
* Track record of going above-and-beyond expectations to achieve outstanding results
* Passion for technology evidenced by personal projects and initiatives
* The work ethic and confidence to shine alongside motivated colleagues
* Professional written and spoken English with excellent presentation skills
* Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
* Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
* Appreciative of diversity, polite and effective in a multi-cultural, multi-national organisation
* Thoughtfulness and self-motivation
* Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
* Ability to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks long


**Additional Skills That Would Be Nice To Have**
 The following skills may be helpful to you in the role, but we don't expect everyone to bring all of them.
   

  

* Hands-on experience with machine learning libraries, or tools.
* Proven track record of building highly automated machine learning solutions for the cloud.
* Experience with container technologies (Docker, LXD, Kubernetes, etc.)
* Experience with public clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
* Working knowledge of cloud computing
* Passionate about software quality and testing
* Experience working on an open source project


 What we offer colleagues
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.
